name: Dodge Role
description:
Dodge role is the game of fighting dice! You are a six sided die, three classes to play with. Roll for your class to fight different enemies. The mage for long range, the rouge to get in close, and the paladin to show them your might.  Survive and defeat your multisided foes in the Castle of the Nine Sides!

Credits for 2022 GMTK Jam

Programming: Thomas Lucas

Design Management and Narrative: Trevor Shaw

Asset Management:  John Gabriel
